Input:RetrieverIdOrName.title: RetrieverIdOrName
Input:RetrieverIdOrName.description:
Not applicable for fallback message. This field can be left empty or set to "N/A" as the fallback action does not perform any knowledge base retrieval. It delivers a static, formatted message with alternative support options.

**Value:** N/A
**Purpose:** Placeholder field - not used in fallback message generation
**Note:** This input is not utilized by the fallback action but may be required by the system configuration

Input:Query.title: Query
Input:Query.description: The original user query that will be displayed in the fallback message for context. This helps users understand what question could not be answered and allows them to consider rephrasing.
